# ELECE Barber Website Project

This is a premium AAA website for ELECE Barber, a professional barbershop located in Albuixech, Valencia.

## Project Context
- **Business**: ELECE Barber - Professional barbershop
- **Location**: Albuixech, Valencia, Spain
- **Services**: Haircuts, beard styling, hair washing, eyebrow trimming
- **Target**: Modern, professional website with booking integration
- **Technologies**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, responsive design

## Development Guidelines
- Focus on modern, clean design with professional barbershop aesthetics
- Implement responsive design for mobile-first approach
- Use semantic HTML and accessible design patterns
- Integrate with Booksy booking system
- Optimize for performance and SEO
- Include smooth animations and modern UI/UX patterns

## Key Features
- Hero section with booking CTA
- Services showcase
- Team/barber profiles
- Photo gallery
- Customer reviews
- Contact information
- Online booking integration
- Mobile-responsive design
